name: Knife in a Gunfight
description:
It's just ol Billy Bobcat vs an army of rowdy rustlers. Can you last until the last wave and beat Dyna-Dan?! [BRACKEY'S 2021.2 GAMEJAM SUBMISSION]

POWER-UPS:

Horseshoe = Speed Boost

Knife = Decreased Knife Throw Cooldown

Lucky of the Irish (Hidden) = X2 Multiplier

CREDITS:

Design: Colton Moritz

Development: Logan & Zack Weathersby

Main Menu Music: Colton Weathersby
